overview: The Copilot SDK is now available in technical preview, providing language-specific SDKs for programmatic access to the GitHub Copilot CLI.

detailed_explanation.title: Overview
bullets: The Copilot SDK is now available in technical preview, providing language-specific SDKs for programmatic access to the GitHub Copilot CLI.

detailed_explanation.title: Available SDKs
bullets: The Copilot SDK is available in four languages:

detailed_explanation.title: Key features
bullets: All SDKs provide a consistent API with:
Multi-turn conversations : Maintain session history for context-aware interactions.
Tool execution : Define custom tools that the model can invoke during conversations.
Full lifecycle control : Manage client and session lifecycles programmatically.

detailed_explanation.title: Learn More
bullets: Try out the GitHub Copilot SDK Cookbook

detailed_explanation.title: Share your feedback
bullets: Join the GitHub Community to share your feedback.
